thread.title: Mark Hamill shows us what Trump would look like as the Joker
thread.title_full: Mark Hamill shows us what Trump would look like as the Joker

author: USA TODAY
title: Mark Hamill shows us what Trump would look like as the Joker
text:
Mark Hamill shows us what Trump would look like as the Joker Jayme Deerwester , USA TODAY 4:23 p.m. ET Jan. 14, 2017 
A week ago, Mark Hamill treated us to a dramatic reading in the voice of Batman's Joker of Donald Trump's tweet calling Meryl Streep overrated . 
Now, the Star Wars icon, who also voices the Batman villain in multiple animated series, has done us one better and given the president-elect a full-on Joker makeover . 
And the results are ... arguably more disturbing than Heath Ledger in the nurse costume. See for yourself: Am I the ONLY one man enough to confront this #OverratedFlunkyLoser without resorting to an ad hominem assault? https://t.co/ac2j2KGryn pic.twitter.com/iH1XnPgOzm â€” Mark Hamill (@HamillHimself) January 14, 2017 Now compare. 
(Latin refresher: An ad hominem attack is when you come back at someone personally rather than criticize the points in their argument. Sound like anyone you know?) Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2ixzkXN Most Popular
